page.title: 05FINHAM SEWAGE WORKS 2
page.content: control facilities are included in the power house building and list data on the works as well as on the pumping stations within the Coventry area. The works comes within the Avon Division of the Severn Trent Water Authority. The Divisional Controller,Engineer,and staff are based here as are the region al laborities for the whole authority. Additional land for sewage treatment is located south of Coventry airport where about fifteen years ago land was acquired from land owned by Coventry Corporation and which was being worked by a tenant farmer. The present sewage works land is now sited between the farmhouse and its buildings and the main part of the farm's land.
